text: Maurice Richard Severino (November 17, 1919 - August 28, 2005) was an American bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. He finished ninth in the four-man event at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo. Severino also served in the United States Air Force, rising to the rank of colonel. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh four-man results *United States Air Force Memorial Foundation featuring Severino. title: Maurice R. Severino
